name: leointeg
displayName: Leo Editor Integration with Visual Studio Code
description: Use Leo, the literate editor with outline, directly in vscode.

leoIntegration.checkForChangeExternalFil.description: Set default for checking changes to external files

leoIntegration.defaultReloadIgnore.description: Set default for derived files so that they reload, or ignore, when changes are detected

leoIntegration.leoTreeBrowse.description: Specifies whether to use Leo's style of tree browsing with the arrow keys

leoIntegration.treeKeepFocus.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when selecting a node - overridden by "leoTreeBrowse"

leoIntegration.treeKeepFocusWhenAside.description: Specifies whether to keep focus in the outline when opening a body pane on the side

leoIntegration.goAnywhereShortcut.description: Enables Leo's 'Go Anywhere' to replace 'Go to file' with the Ctrl+P keyboard shortcut when focus in in outline or body

leoIntegration.collapseAllShortcut.description: Enables the Alt+'-' keyboard shortcut for collapsing all folders in the Explorer View

leoIntegration.activityViewShortcut.description: Enables the Ctrl+Shift+L keyboard shortcut for showing the LeoIntegration view

leoIntegration.treeInExplorer.description: Show the outline tree in the explorer view

leoIntegration.showOpenAside.description: Offer 'Open to the Side' in nodes context menu

leoIntegration.showEditOnNodes.description: Shows 'Edit Headline' button on tree nodes

leoIntegration.invertNodeContrast.description: Inverts the contrast of the dirty/clean border aspect of tree nodes

leoIntegration.leoEditorPath.description: Specifies the location of your Leo-Editor installation

leoIntegration.leoPythonCommand.description: Specifies the command to start python (Defaults to 'py' on windows and 'python3' otherwise)

leoIntegration.startServerAutomatically.description: Starts a Leo server automatically, by running the Leo server script

leoIntegration.connectToServerAutomatica.description: Connect automatically to a Leo server on specified 'Connection Port' upon activation of this extension

leoIntegration.setDetached.description: Starts the server process with the 'detached' flag - Allows a dialog to be shown after closing for unsaved Leo documents

leoIntegration.limitUsers.description: Limit of concurrent connections - Allows for multi-user synchronous editing

viewsWelcome.contents:
Not Connected
[Start Server](command:leointeg.startServer)
[Connect to Server](command:leointeg.connectToServer)
Server startup and connection can be automated in LeoInteg's [configuration settings](command:leointeg.showSettingsPage)

Not Connected
[Start Server](command:leointeg.startServer)
[Connect to Server](command:leointeg.connectToServer)
Server startup and connection can be automated in LeoInteg's [configuration settings](command:leointeg.showSettingsPage)

[Connect to Server](command:leointeg.connectToServer)
